enb_long_title: 42nd Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-42)
sentences: On Monday morning, Acting IPCC Chair El Gizouli reported that the IPCC COI Committee (IPCC-XLII/INF.
3) had met and reviewed the disclosure forms submitted in relation to Bureau nominations.
He reported that some minor issues were identified but expected these to be resolved after further discussion with nominees.
Saudi Arabia requested that the Panel provide further guidance to the Committee.
The Panel took note of the initial report.
The COI Committee continued to meet throughout the session to consider possible COI related to further nominations.
